0101011100000001 1100000110001110 0 -> sum: 0001100010001111, cout: 1

1010111000011000 0011011110001100 1 -> sum: 1110010110100101, cout: 0
0000001010001001 0011111101100111 1 -> sum: 0100000111110001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
